video.title: Hilda
video.synopsis: Fearless, free-spirited Hilda finds new friends, adventure and magical creatures when she leaves her enchanted forest home and journeys to the city.

episodes.synopsis: Tiny, invisible people threaten Hilda's fun and adventurous life in the wilderness with her mother and pet deer-fox, Twig.
episodes.title: Chapter 1: The Hidden People

episodes.synopsis: Hilda reaches out to a sad and lonely giant while her mum, worried about the threats they've received, mulls over a move to the city of Trolberg.
episodes.title: Chapter 2: The Midnight Giant

episodes.synopsis: Encouraged by her mother to make new friends on the playground, Hilda instead buddies up to an injured bird who's lost his memory.
episodes.title: Chapter 3: The Bird Parade

episodes.synopsis: After joining the Sparrow Scouts, Hilda partners with new pals Frida and David to clean up a park, little realizing what's lurking underground.
episodes.title: Chapter 4: The Sparrow Scouts

episodes.synopsis: On parent-teacher night, Hilda springs into action when she discovers David's pet rock project hides a dangerous secret.
episodes.title: Chapter 5: The Troll Rock

episodes.synopsis: When David blames his nightmares on Hilda and her hair-raising exploits, she decides to try and help him face his fears.
episodes.title: Chapter 6: The Nightmare Spirit

episodes.synopsis: On a quest to earn their Sparrow Scouts botany badges, Hilda, David and Frida make a surprising discovery when they search for a rare plant.
episodes.title: Chapter 7: The Lost Clan

episodes.synopsis: Hilda realizes the importance of being detail-oriented when she casts a spell from a book of enchantments -- and fails to read the fine print.
episodes.title: Chapter 8: The Tide Mice

episodes.synopsis: Frida's messy room and missing book lead the gang on a ghost hunt that ends up putting their growing friendship to the test.
episodes.title: Chapter 9: The Ghost

episodes.synopsis: When her favorite radio weather reporter goes silent amid a raging blizzard, Hilda decides to investigate, with David and the Raven in tow.
episodes.title: Chapter 10: The Storm

episodes.synopsis: Alone and lost in the wilderness, Hilda bumps into an old friend and asks for help getting home. Back in Trolberg, her worried mum looks for her.
episodes.title: Chapter 11: The House in the Woods

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of an overnight camping trip, Hilda tries to help a down-and-out house spirit. Frida makes new friends. A mysterious beast prowls Trolberg.
episodes.title: Chapter 12: The Nisse

episodes.synopsis: As fear grips the city over the Black Hound, Hilda makes it her mission to help Tontu, even if it means having less time to earn Sparrow Scout badges.
episodes.title: Chapter 13: The Black Hound

episodes.synopsis: Hilda's essay about her close encounter with a troll wins her the chance to tag along with Trolberg's new head of the safety patrol, Erik Ahlberg.
episodes.title: Chapter 1: The Troll Circle

episodes.synopsis: A quest to uncover secret information about Ahlberg leads Hilda on a high-seas adventure with the Wood Man that lands them in a boatload of trouble.
episodes.title: Chapter 2: The Draugen

episodes.synopsis: After Hilda and Frida come across a magical portal at the library, they must team up with the librarian in a race against time to find a missing book.
episodes.title: Chapter 3: The Witch

episodes.synopsis: David confronts his many fears when he stumbles into a ferocious battle during an overnight Sparrow Scouts camping trip with Hilda and Frida.
episodes.title: Chapter 4: The Eternal Warriors

episodes.synopsis: On a bird-watching expedition, Hilda, Frida and David run into meteorologist Victoria Van Gale, whose calm new life makes one of them very suspicious.
episodes.title: Chapter 5: The Windmill

episodes.synopsis: Chaos comes to Trolberg when the bell system begins to ring every hour, inspiring Hilda and friends to hatch an elaborate scheme to quiet the noise.
episodes.title: Chapter 6: The Old Bells of Trolberg

episodes.synopsis: Hilda and Frida launch an in-depth investigation to prove the fire-breathing resident of Cauldron Island isn't responsible for a wave of boat attacks.
episodes.title: Chapter 7: The Beast of Cauldron Island

episodes.synopsis: Hilda learns all too well that actions have consequences after she discovers a way to travel back in time — and decides to make a few changes.
episodes.title: Chapter 8: The Fifty Year Night

episodes.synopsis: After Hilda's deer-fox companion Twig leaves home and runs into the wilderness, Hilda and her mum set off on a search that stirs bittersweet memories.
episodes.title: Chapter 9: The Deerfox

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Trolberg's Winter Festival, Hilda, Frida and David come across a group of odd little fellows who are on the hunt for naughty kids.
episodes.title: Chapter 10: The Yule Lads

episodes.synopsis: Hilda and pals gear up for a magical mission: to reverse an enchantment that's taken over the headquarters of the local snack food company, Jorts.
episodes.title: Chapter 11: The Jorts Incident

episodes.synopsis: Desperate times call for desperate measures as Alfur faces questions from the Elf Kingdom over his exciting reports from Trolberg.
episodes.title: Chapter 12: The Replacement

episodes.synopsis: Hilda, her mum and Twig look for a way out of a mysterious forest full of trolls, while a worried David and Frida journey out of Trolberg to find them.
episodes.title: Chapter 13: The Stone Forest
